GSD.description:
net: ethernet: dec: tulip: de4x5: fix possible array overflows in type3_infoblock()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.257 by commit ae3c30ca1894ead38e39576289e5a8346621450f. For more details please see the references link.
